action.action-desc: Mr. Lawson of Florida (for himself, Ms. Wilson of Florida, Mr. Bishop of Georgia, Ms. Norton, Mr. Hastings, Ms. Lee, and Ms. Bass) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to provide mandatory funding for grants to upgrade agricultural and food sciences facilities at 1890 land-grant colleges, including Tuskegee University.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the HBCU Parity Act of 2018.

section.header: Grants to upgrade agricultural and food sciences facilities at 1890 land-grant colleges, including Tuskegee University
section.text: Section 1447(b) of the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 (7 U.S.C. 3222b(b)) is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section $50,000,000, to remain available until expended, for fiscal year 2018 and each fiscal year thereafter.

Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary of Agriculture shall use to carry out this section $50,000,000, to remain available until expended, for fiscal year 2018 and each fiscal year thereafter.
